title: "AI approach could predict treatment strategy for arrhythmia patients"
excerpt: "Researchers from the School of Biomedical Engineering & Imaging Sciences have proposed a novel approach to personalisation of catheter ablation therapy for atrial fibrillation (AF), a common cardiac arrhythmia that affects over one percent of the population and is associated with high levels of morbidity and mortality."
